definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: And those little ones all paler than death.
sentences.chinese: 和這些孩子們都蒼白比死亡。

sentences.english: Lying in the emergency room looking pale.
sentences.chinese: 躺在急診室的她臉色看起很蒼白。

sentences.english: Let your love in kisses rain. on my lips and eyelids pale.
sentences.chinese: 讓伱的愛隨吻的密雨降落，落在莪蒼白的脣和眼丄。

sentences.english: On hearing that, her face went white to the lips.
sentences.chinese: 一聽那話她臉色登時變得蒼白，直白到嘴脣了。

sentences.english: Anything else is a sham, a pale imitation.
sentences.chinese: 別的都是騙局，都是蒼白的仿製品。

sentences.english: When all of war's dusts and clamours settle.
sentences.chinese: 戰場上的塵土已然蒼白。

sentences.english: They are like junkies, with unkempt hair and beards, bad skin and poor appetites.
sentences.chinese: 跟毒癮者般，頭髮鬍子不修，皮膚蒼白，缺乏食慾。

sentences.english: Even if does burning pond red simply streaming to rotate also hide not to live her pallor.
sentences.chinese: 縱使炎池紅光流轉，也遮不住她的蒼白。

sentences.english: Who pale I wait, the irony of my dedication.
sentences.chinese: 線誰蒼白了我的等待，諷刺了我的執着。

sentences.english: The turquoise stones gleamed brightly against the pallor of his palm as he spread the ornament before her.
sentences.chinese: 藍綠色的寶石在他蒼白的手掌中熠熠發光。

sentences.english: Marguerite, extremely pale and with her mouth half open, was trying to catch her breath.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格麗特的臉色蒼白，嘴半張着，竭力想喘過氣來。

sentences.english: Even the smudged windows framed a night so black that I could see nothing there but my own pale face.
sentences.chinese: 髒兮兮的窗子一片黑暗，只能映出我蒼白的臉。

sentences.english: GABA is the major neurotransmitter involved in the globus pallidus.
sentences.chinese: GABA是蒼白球主要的神經遞質。

sentences.english: Iron-deficiency anemia can lead to a pale color along with a thin, brittle, ridged texture.
sentences.chinese: 缺鐵性貧血會導致蒼白的顏色和薄，脆，縱橫條紋。

sentences.english: With industrial-scale whaling, cultural claims ring hollow.
sentences.chinese: 面對工業規模的捕鯨，人文呼籲顯得蒼白無力。

definition: to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
